author: Rai Furniss-Greasley
description:
Elsewhere, C.L. Clark released their third book in the Magic of the Lost series, The Sovereign, at the end of September and on the same day she also published Fate’s Bane: a novella featuring a tragic sapphic adventure. To confirm, when it is described as ‘tragic’, absolutely take that in the Greek or Shakespearean sense […]

The post REVIEW: Fate’s Bane by C.L. Clark appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Fate’s Bane by C.L. Clark
